thread.title: Laurenn
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Laurenn

author: Laurenn
title: Laurenn
text: So happy that we were sent one of these for a Christmas gift! My children and I enjoyed it so much I ordered 2 more. The best puzzle I have ever done. Pieces are a good size and fit together well. Very well made! No rough edges and almost no "puzzle dust" as we call it. So glad when I can get my teenagers to do something other than video games! So relaxing and enjoyable. We love the collages. I will be ordering a lot more and will probably be a lifetime customer! This might sound like an exaggeration, but I am very serious. Only wish I had more time to spend on things like this.
